author: craigmcc
msg: Equip the build scripts for "catalina", "jasper", and "webapps" to run
JUnit based unit tests (compiled and executed only if you have junit.jar
on your CLASSPATH) when you run "ant test".
Added an initial JUnit test suite for org.apache.catalina.util.CookieTools
to illustrate the concept.  Additional Catalina unit tests should go under

author: craigmcc
msg: Forgot to save to disk before checking in.

author: craigmcc
msg: Enable the proposed new build mechanism, without disabling the old one
yet.  The "build.bat" and "build.sh" scripts are proposed to be removed,
per mail on the TOMCAT-DEV list.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the golden files to reflect the corrected behavior of session
attribute events -- replacement events should include the *old* value, not

author: craigmcc
msg: Spec compliance bug fix on ServletContextAttributeEvent and
HttpSessionBindingEvent.  When an attribute is replaced, the event object
should include the *old* value, not the *new* value.
